comments.body: The reference to `azure_rm_aks_info` appears to be incorrect.
we should probably have a single line here for all the modules, instead of adding it for every renamed module

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +79,83 @@* The ``memset_server_facts`` module was renamed to :ref:`memset_server_info <memset_server_info_module>`.
* The ``one_image_facts`` module was renamed to :ref:`one_image_info <one_image_info_module>`.
* The ``azure_rm_resourcegroup_facts`` module was renamed to :ref:`azure_rm_aks_info <azure_rm_resourcegroup_info_module>`.

Plugins

comments.body: Looks good. Should this be an inventory specific setting to avoid breaking things?
Unsure this is 'long standing bug' IMHO, but I'm willing to entertain a toggle if needed, I doubt this affects many people (but those are famous last words).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@========

 * ``hash_behaviour`` now affects inventory sources. If you have it set to ``merge``, the data you get from inventory might change and you will have to update playbooks accordingly. If you're using the default setting (``overwrite``), you will see no changes. Inventory was ignoring this setting.

comments.body: Does this module depends on nxos_vlan? I'm not sure why this phrase is here. Thanks!
No this module doesn't depend on nxos_vlan. I missed adding vlan deprecation when I opened a PR nxos_vlans. Since it's already been merged, I have added the deprecation for that in this PR.
